trans-unit.source: Generate TTL based self expiring crumbs (token).
trans-unit.target: 生成基于TTL的自到期面包屑(代币)。

trans-unit.source: ` >>> from crumb import Crumb >>> >>> # generate crumb for user that expires in 30 seconds >>> c = Crumb('tim@tom.com', 30, secret='!@#$') >>> c.generate() 830b60fe77b2 >>> >>> # key attribute also contains the generated crumb >>> print c.key 830b60fe77b2 >>> >>> # verify the generated crumb >>> c = Crumb('tim@tom.com', 30, secret='!@#$',key='830b60fe77b2') >>> c.validate() True >>> >>> # try to verify again after 60 sec >>> c.validate() False `
trans-unit.target: `>>从面包屑导入面包屑>>> >>>＃为在30秒后过期的用户生成面包屑>>> c =面包屑（'tim@tom.com'，30，secret ='！@＃$'） >>> c.generate（）830b60fe77b2 >>> >>>＃键属性还包含生成的面包屑>>>打印c.key 830b60fe77b2 >>> >>>＃验证生成的面包屑>>> c = Crumb（' tim@tom.com'，30，secret ='！@＃$'，key ='830b60fe77b2'）>>> c.validate（）True >>> >>>＃尝试在60秒后再次验证>>> c.validate（）假`
